about_the_game:
This game is a modern twist on block crumbling.
It is a puzzle RPG with RPG battle elements and a growth system.
Break blocks to get skill points, spend skill points to strengthen your abilities, and strengthen your armor to become stronger!
Destroy the sassy TOKAI Girl's costumes (clothing) completely and open up the best romance scenes!

Battle



Use the command-selection RPG-style interface to reduce the girls' HP to 0!
The girls' damage reactions are a highlight of this game!
The more you reduce their HP, the more their armor will break down.

Romance Scene



Enjoy interactive scenes with text and animation.
You're sure to be excited by the beautiful illustrations and smooth, lifelike animation!
7 fully animated scenes in total

Skill Shop and Blacksmith



Strengthen your skills and aim to defeat the Girls!
You can increase the number of times you can use your skills by spending skill points (SP) earned in battle at the skill shop.
Some skills can evolve in function, so keep strengthening them.
You can purchase armor at the blacksmith.
Purchased armor can be equipped to increase your defensive power.
It will protect you from the Girls' super powerful attack, "Brutal Hit."
You can also strengthen purchased equipment by spending Gold.
Even if you lose once, don't be discouraged - strengthen your armor and challenge the Girls again and again.

Item Shop


You can purchase potions at the item shop.
Potions increase your maximum HP and allow you to withstand stronger attacks.
They only take effect once per battle stage, and their effects will not disappear until the end of the battle.

Character Introduction



　YUKI

Participates in block-breaking battles to earn money for his younger brother's medicine.
Although he is weak and timid, he has a love that would do anything for his younger brother.

　LILITH

A modern man who has been lost in another world.
He joins a battle to return to his original world.
He is an eccentric man who keeps tentacles as pets even in his original world.

　MIKI

She possesses the special power to transform into a magical girl.
She loves justice and is cheerful and active, but she also easily gets carried away and her foul mouth often brings trouble upon herself.
She has extremely large breasts.
She is surprisingly shy and has no experience dating a man.

　LINDEL

An elf whose home village was overrun by orcs.
He participates in this block-breaking battle to find and kill the orc who violated his mother.
He makes fun of humans, calling them inferior.

Skill List

Split（Evolution）
Splitting Ball

Fireball
Penetrating ball

Recovery（Evolution）
HP Recovery

Shield
A shield that prevents the ball from being lost just once.

Laser（Not for sale）
Stretch out in a straight line and destroy the block in front

Paddle long（Not for sale）
The paddle operated by the player extends sideways.

Paddle Short（Not for sale）
The paddle operated by the player becomes shorter.

Adsorption（Not for sale）
The ball sticks to the paddle

Bind Resist
Girls' counterattack, relaxing action restrictions due to weights

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not appropriate for all ages.
This game contains adult content, including nudity and sexual scenes, sexual violence, non-consensual sex, BDSM,
interspecies sex, sex with male dildos, penetrative sex (hand), bondage and prostitution.
Limbs are obscured for dramatic effect in some scenes; however, they are not missing limbs.
All characters in this game are over the age of 20.

name: TOKAI Girl -Block Breaking RPG-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11, Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX960
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Schimpfwörte
Fantasy-Gewalt

short_description: Destroy the armor of the "TOKAI Girls" by destroying blocks! A puzzle RPG with RPG growth elements added to the classic block destroyer! Save up SP, raise your level, and take on the TOKAI GIRLS!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
